content: this crochet snowflake is #6 of this year s mini cal the collection of ornaments has wintery names fitting perfectly into the season of cold white snow and festivities explore the list of all free patterns in this post 1 this pattern uses basic and tall stitches as well as working in the round the finished snowflake measures circa 10 5 cm 4 1″ 1 https //crochetpedia com/crochet-snowflake-patterns-2023/
